title: Love Love Love-udi lyrics Mappillai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Rahul & Rita
Song: Love Love Love-udi
Movie : Mappillai
Lyrics: Snehan

Love Love Love-udi, en laila neethaan di
Jill jill jill nenjukul ne vaadi
Dhil dhil dhil-uda ennai theendura killadi
Va va va paakalam, vizhayaadi
Ultra modela, vandha vennila
Amstrong muzhumayaai thozhaidhaal unnila

Cell phona pola naan sinuguren unnala
Sim carda pola nee vaayen ullara
Rocketa pola nan suthuren pinnala
Satellite-ah maari enna paradi kannala

Love Love Love-udi, en laila neethaan di
Jill jill jill nenjukul ne vaadi
Dhil dhil dhil-uda ennai theendura killadi
Va va va paakalam, vizhayaadi

Minsaram pachura poochedi neethan di
Minsara poova kooda mutham iduven naanthaan di
Kadhalan seikindra kayangal vazhikadhe
Kadavule thozhaindhal kooda kadhal mattum kuraiyadhe
Enenna uinbam serthu unnai thaan neidhano
Eppodhum unnai sutra ennai anaai avane seithano
Cell phona pola naan sinuguren unnala....
Love Love Love-udi, en laila neethaan di ...

Velvettu dhegatha parthadhum vizhdhene
kalvettu pola undhan kangal pattu azhundhene
Boomiya thaandiye poguren thannaala
Veroru gragathula vazhurene unnala
Aasaiku rekkai unndu aanalum parakkathu
Angathil asaivom seivom veru paadu kidayaadhe

Cell phona pola naan sinuguren unnala
Sim carda pola nee vaayen ullara
Rocketa pola nan suthuren pinnala
Satellite-ah maari enna paradi kannala
